==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Ernest:''' Huh? Where did you come from? What do you want with me?
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing?
::'''Ernest:''' I'm the cellar manager here. Occasionally I oversee stock transportation.
::'''Ernest:''' The role isn't stressful, and the boss is extravagant &mdash; he pays me quite well.
::'''Ernest:''' Even without all that, just being in the company of this priceless stash is amazing.
::'''Ernest:''' Just think of how few people ever get a chance to even see such magnificence, let alone work with it.
:{{DIcon}} What's over there?
::'''Ernest:''' The wine cellar. What would I be doing here otherwise?
::'''Ernest:''' Let me tell you, don't get any ideas about this wine here...
::'''Ernest:''' You'd never have the chance to put them into action anyway...
::'''Ernest:''' No, no. It's nothing.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Ernest:''' Off you go then. Take care now.
{{Dialogue end}}
